amendment.description: Amendment sought to cut approximately $12 million from various USDA offices responsible for carrying out administrative, communications, education, policy, economics, and statistical functions.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, preprinted in the Congressional Record of July 17, as amendment No. 30, to cut $12 million in funds appropriated in the bill for various USDA administrative and support accounts.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Allard amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 196 - 232 (Roll no. 539).
